summary: Replaces each word of Raan Mir Tah with a variation of Flutterhy\'s \"You\'re going to love me\" line from My Little Pony: FiM
descriptionHtml:
I know mods of this exist, what I think makes mine different is the fact that I have different audio for each level of the shout.

Raan - LOVE ME
Raan Mir - You LOVE ME
Raan Mir Tah - You\'re going to LOVE ME

[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XmAHNNEEgGU&feature=youtu.be]The shout in action[/url]

To install either use the extremely handy Nexus manager or extract the file in the Data folder wherever you installed the game. By default the path is 
C::\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

This was the first shout I could come up with some clear audio for, when I have more time I\'ll be doing something similar with the other shouts. Maybe updating some old mods with a different line when I release more. Suggestions are welcome in the comments, even for a mod name since I had nothing better than this.

In the spirit of shameless self promotion, here\'s the other other mod I have uploaded so far.
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3732]Fus Ro Yay[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3985]Trollestia Commands you to Catch on Fire[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4902]LUNA SHOUTS AT TIME AND IT OBEYS[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5201]Whirlwind Dash[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5981]Timber Wolves are a Howlin\'[/url]

All audio is taken from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
author: Snowraptor
